issue.title: [R] Linux installation should run quieter by default
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7862](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7862). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
No need to blow up the console by default. Also this solves an `R CMD check` warning that surfaced on CRAN.
